bibl.title: A Fragmentary Psalter from Karanis and its Context.

series.title: Studies in Scripture in Early Judaism and Christianity.

bibl.note: Paper read at the SBL in 2005 (Philadelphia). Psalms 32-33 (33-34). Third century A.D. - Papyrus. - Context [The house C 87, excavated in 1928.] - A prosopography of possibly Christian names from excavated Karanis. - Magic and christianity. - Pp. 310-312: Appendix.

bibl.title: Jewish and Christian Scripture as Artifact and Canon

bibl.seg: Schwendner Gregg, A Fragmentary Psalter from Karanis and its Context.

Craig A. Evans and H. Daniel Zacharias (Edd.), Jewish and Christian Scripture as Artifact and Canon = Studies in Scripture in Early Judaism and Christianity. 13 = Library of Second Temple Studies. 70 (London, 2009) pp. 117-136, 1 tabl.

Paper read at the SBL in 2005 (Philadelphia). Psalms 32-33 (33-34). Third century A.D. - Papyrus. - Context [The house C 87, excavated in 1928.] - A prosopography of possibly Christian names from excavated Karanis. - Magic and christianity. - Pp. 310-312: Appendix.
